name: Morugarde
quote: The scourge of the undead once, now? There's a reason cremation's become preferable.

name: Ravendraught
quote: Bone speakers playing at merchants. Those ravens are not simply aesthetic.

name: Viridescent Vigil
quote: Older than most nations and among the first druids in existence. Needest thou a guide in the realm of faerie, they are it.

name: Sternbough
quote: At journey's end, he found it, home, beyond the Mountain of Eld.

name: Greygong
quote: Their fault was the same as any of our kind, they dug too deep.
